blogs.title: Matrix World Short-Term Roadmap
blogs.author: MatrixWorld
blogs.description:
Now that the presale is behind us, the Matrix World team is putting all of its
energy into building the Matrix World metaverse. Here is what to expect in the
near future!

The Blocto team is currently reviewing and integrating the Flow Land Voucher
wallet support. By the end of November, Matrix World users should be able to
view Flow Lands in their Blocto wallet and trade Flow Lands on the NFT
marketplace.

Land transfer functionality and user profiles will be added to our website in
early December. Matrix Land owners will be able to easily transfer their Lands
to different wallet addresses directly from the Matrix World website. Users will
also be able to view their wallet addresses, Land(s), and Land details in their
user profile.

Land Transfer Functionality

In mid-December, Matrix Land owners will be able to add extra information to
their Land(s). Land details will be accessible from the User Profile page and
will allow users to customize how their Lands are presented on the map. Users
will be able to add information such as a Name and Description to their Land, as
well as media.

User Profile and Land Details

Land owners will be able to add media such as images, videos, and 3D models to
the Land Details and the Land Map depending on the size of their Land, more
info below:

1x1 Lands - Users will be able to add an image to their Land Details

2x2 Lands - Users will be able to add an image or a video to their Land Details

3x3 Lands - Users will be able to display an image on their Land’s map tile and
add an image or a video to their Land Details

6×6 Lands - Users will be able to display a 3D model or an image on their Land’s
map tile and add an image or a video to their Land Details

By mid-January, the Matrix World team plans to release its first metaverse
demos. The team plans to release 5–6 demo avatars and a few demo spaces. The
demo spaces will include Flow HQ, the Matrix World Museum Public Gallery, and
the Matrix World Museum Private Gallery. The Private Gallery will be an
exclusive area for Land owners to view and display their NFT collections.

If you have any questions, please feel free to join us on any of the channels
listed below. Thanks!

Telegram:
Twitter:
Discord:
blogs.content:
Now that the presale is behind us, the Matrix World team is putting all of its energy into building the Matrix World metaverse. Here is what to expect in the near future!

1. Blocto Support

The Blocto team is currently reviewing and integrating the Flow Land Voucher wallet support. By the end of November, Matrix World users should be able to view Flow Lands in their Blocto wallet and trade Flow Lands on the BloctoBay NFT marketplace.

2. Land Transfers & User Profiles

Land transfer functionality and user profiles will be added to our website in early December. Matrix Land owners will be able to easily transfer their Lands to different wallet addresses directly from the Matrix World website. Users will also be able to view their wallet addresses, Land(s), and Land details in their user profile.

3. Upgraded Map Features

In mid-December, Matrix Land owners will be able to add extra information to their Land(s). Land details will be accessible from the User Profile page and will allow users to customize how their Lands are presented on the map. Users will be able to add information such as a Name and Description to their Land, as well as media.

Land owners will be able to add media such as images, videos, and 3D models to the Land Details and the Land Map depending on the size of their Land, more info below:

1x1 Lands - Users will be able to add an image to their Land Details

2x2 Lands - Users will be able to add an image or a video to their Land Details

3x3 Lands - Users will be able to display an image on their Land’s map tile and add an image or a video to their Land Details

6×6 Lands - Users will be able to display a 3D model or an image on their Land’s map tile and add an image or a video to their Land Details

4. Demo Avatars & Demo Spaces

By mid-January, the Matrix World team plans to release its first metaverse demos. The team plans to release 5–6 demo avatars and a few demo spaces. The demo spaces will include Flow HQ, the Matrix World Museum Public Gallery, and the Matrix World Museum Private Gallery. The Private Gallery will be an exclusive area for Land owners to view and display their NFT collections.

If you have any questions, please feel free to join us on any of the channels listed below. Thanks!

Telegram: https://t.me/joinchat/26ov1EJ6Ln82MjI1
Twitter: https://twitter.com/theMatrixWorld
Discord: https://discord.gg/bMQh4ztyhP

blogs.title: Matrix World Meme Competition — Twitter
blogs.author: MatrixWorld
blogs.description:
Are you a humorous creator? Are you a meme enthusiast? Would you like to create
the first viral meme in Matrix World? If so, then now is your time to shine
because Matrix World is holding its first-ever Meme Competition and we can’t
wait to see what all of our creative community members come up with!

We believe that Meme is worth a thousand words, and we are looking for the most
valuable meme. The judges will be Matrix World community members. The creators
of the Top 3 memes will share $450, in addition, the top meme will get a
permanent display space in the Matrix World Museum!

> A few steps you need to follow:

1) The file format must be JPG, PNG, or GIF.

2) Please do not use copyright-protected materials or content containing
copyright-protected visual effects, such as logos, brand names, etc.

3) Make sure you have powerful content that fits our theme! Such as Matrix
World, Ansari our cute little girl, and the “Matrix World” words!

The official logos for the Matrix World and Ansari can be found at:

4) Follow Matrix World on Twitter, Telegram, and Discord.

5) Tweet your meme with #MatrixWorld and TAG @theMatrixWorld

6) Use #MatrixWorld in our Telegram channel to send us your tweet link.

The winners will be decided based on the number of likes.

> Important Dates

Submission Deadline: November 21st, 10:00 PM PDT

Winner announcement Date: November 22nd, 10:00 PM PDT

> Prizes

🥇 $200+ a permanent display space in the Matrix World Museum

🥈 $150

🥉 $100

All users must have a valid ETH address, Twitter handle, and email. These
addresses must be shared with us to participate in the competition.

We wish you success and look forward to some high-quality Matrix World memes!

PS: Please follow all of our instructions carefully and let the meme competition
begin!

Website：
Twitter：
Telegram:
Discord:

Are you a humorous creator? Are you a meme enthusiast? Would you like to create the first viral meme in Matrix World? blogs.title: Matrix Land Pre-sale Completed Successfully!
blogs.author: MatrixWorld
blogs.description:
It is great that you have decided to join the Metaverse revolution with Matrix
World! The Matrix Land pre-sale activity was completed successfully with a total
sales of 10000 Lands at the price of 0.20 ETH per Land. This activity was
divided into three rounds, the detailed information for each round is
given below.

Matrix World got featured by Flowverse on Oct 07 before the first round began.
The first round of the Land pre-sale started on Oct 11, 2021, 00:00 PDT, and
2000 Lands were made available to be purchased by the selected applicants.
Applicants were given 72 hours given to claim the Lands, but more than half of
the Lands were claimed in the first 24 hours! Confirmation letters were sent to
481 out of 13,000 applications for the first wave of 2000 Lands on Ethereum.

The second round of the Land pre-sale started on Oct 26th at 08:00 AM PDT.
During the second round, 5000 Lands were available to be purchased by the
selected applicants on Flow blockchain on a first-come, first-served basis
within 72 hours. Applicants applied for 55000 Lands, with 7154 applications in
total. After careful review, 896 applications were selected for the second round
of 5000 Lands on Flow. Flow blockchain, and Dapper Labs each purchased 108 Lands
to build their virtual HQ’s in Matrix World! All 5000 Lands were sold for ~300K
$Flow which is over $4.1M USD.
Matrix World welcomes all of the new Matrixers to the Matrix World including
Flow Blockchain and Dapper Labs.

The third round of the Matrix Land pre-sale started Nov. 8th, 11:00 p.m. PST /
Nov. 9th, 7:00 a.m. UTC. Due to the massive number of qualified applicants on
Ethereum, the first-come, first-served rule was applied for the third wave also.
The 3000 Lands were purchased by the selected applicants, in less than five
hours, at a price of 0.2 ETH per Land.

The Ethereum blockchain Lands can be traded on the OpenSea NFT marketplace, the
Flow blockchain Lands can be traded on BloctoBay NFT marketplace in near future,
our team is working on that. Matrix World passed 100 ETH volume traded on
OpenSea on Nov 05, 2021. The links for the marketplaces where Land(s) can be
traded are given below.

 1. For Ethereum, Opensea:
 2. For Flow, BloctoBay:

The Matrix Team is thankful to everyone for their support. If you have any
questions, please feel free to join us on any of the channels listed
below. Thanks!

Telegram-EN:
Telegram-CN:
Twitter:
Discord:
blogs.content:
It is great that you have decided to join the Metaverse revolution with Matrix World! The Matrix Land pre-sale activity was completed successfully with a total sales of 10000 Lands at the price of 0.20 ETH per Land. This activity was divided into three rounds, the detailed information for each round is given below.

Round 1: 2000 Lands on Ethereum Blockchain

Matrix World got featured by Flowverse on Oct 07 before the first round began. The first round of the Land pre-sale started on Oct 11, 2021, 00:00 PDT, and 2000 Lands were made available to be purchased by the selected applicants. Applicants were given 72 hours given to claim the Lands, but more than half of the Lands were claimed in the first 24 hours! Confirmation letters were sent to 481 out of 13,000 applications for the first wave of 2000 Lands on Ethereum.

Round 2: 5000 Lands on Flow Blockchain

The second round of the Land pre-sale started on Oct 26th at 08:00 AM PDT. During the second round, 5000 Lands were available to be purchased by the selected applicants on Flow blockchain on a first-come, first-served basis within 72 hours. Applicants applied for 55000 Lands, with 7154 applications in total. After careful review, 896 applications were selected for the second round of 5000 Lands on Flow. Flow blockchain, and Dapper Labs each purchased 108 Lands to build their virtual HQ’s in Matrix World! All 5000 Lands were sold for ~300K $Flow which is over $4.1M USD.
Matrix World welcomes all of the new Matrixers to the Matrix World including Flow Blockchain and Dapper Labs.

Round 3: 3000 Lands on Ethereum

The third round of the Matrix Land pre-sale started Nov. 8th, 11:00 p.m. PST / Nov. 9th, 7:00 a.m. UTC. Due to the massive number of qualified applicants on Ethereum, the first-come, first-served rule was applied for the third wave also. The 3000 Lands were purchased by the selected applicants, in less than five hours, at a price of 0.2 ETH per Land.

Lands Trading Platforms

The Ethereum blockchain Lands can be traded on the OpenSea NFT marketplace, the Flow blockchain Lands can be traded on BloctoBay NFT marketplace in near future, our team is working on that. Matrix World passed 100 ETH volume traded on OpenSea on Nov 05, 2021. The links for the marketplaces where Land(s) can be traded are given below.

  1. For Ethereum, Opensea: https://opensea.io/collection/matrixworld-landvoucher
  2. For Flow, BloctoBay: https://bay.blocto.app/

The Matrix Team is thankful to everyone for their support. If you have any questions, please feel free to join us on any of the channels listed below. Thanks!

Telegram-EN: https://t.me/joinchat/26ov1EJ6Ln82MjI1
Telegram-CN: https://t.me/matrixchinese
Twitter: https://twitter.com/theMatrixWorld
Discord: https://discord.gg/bMQh4ztyhP

blogs.title: Matrix Land Pre-sale FAQ
blogs.author: MatrixWorld
blogs.description:
This post answers the frequently asked questions regarding the Matrix Land
pre-sale. All the members are requested to go through it for better
understanding about the Matrix World and the pre-sale activity.

 1.  Can I still buy Flow Lands? / Is the second wave over?
     Sorry, the second wave of the presale is officially over. All of the
     available Flow Lands have sold out.
 2.  I still have vouchers and see a timer, but it says the Lands are sold out.
     Can I still buy Lands?
     No, you can no longer buy Flow Lands because they are sold out. The second
     wave was done on a First Come First Served basis, so you had to claim your
     Land Vouchers before they sold out OR before the time expired, whichever
     happened first.
 3.  I didn’t get to claim my Land Vouchers on the second wave before it ended,
     can I claim them during the third wave?
     No, the Flow Vouchers and the Ethereum vouchers are separate. To claim
     Vouchers in the third wave you must apply and get selected.
 4.  How can I apply for the third wave?
     You can apply for the third wave on our website at  . You must apply for
     “Ethereum Lands.”
 5.  If I applied for the Flow presale do I have to apply again for the third
     wave?
     Yes, the third wave is on the Ethereum network and your application will be
     linked to your Ethereum wallet, so a Flow application will not qualify you.
     If you have already applied for the Ethereum Lands presale, then you do not
     have to apply again for the third wave, but if you are not sure, it doesn’t
     hurt to apply again.
 6.  If I applied for the first wave do I have to apply again for the third
     wave?
     If you have already applied for the Ethereum Lands presale, then you do not
     have to apply again for the third wave, but if you are not sure, it doesn’t
     hurt to apply again.
 7.  I won Lands in the Flow Lands presale, can I still sign up for the third
     wave?
     Yes, you are still eligible to apply for the third wave even if you won
     Lands in the second wave.
 8.  Is there an application deadline for the third wave?
     There is no hard deadline for the third wave, but the sooner you enter the
     better! The third wave will start on Nov. 8th.
 9.  I applied for the pre-sale, but I haven’t received an email, why?
     You will only receive an email if your application is selected to
     participate.
 10. How will I know if my application is accepted?
     You will receive an email with detailed information about how to claim your
     Land Vouchers and how many you are able to claim.
 11. Do I have to claim all of my Land Vouchers
     No, you are not required to claim all of your vouchers.
 12. What will be the price of Lands in the third wave?
     The third wave of lands will cost 0.2 ETH per Land, same as the first wave.
 13. Can I buy Lands with Flow during the third wave?
     No, the third wave will be on the Ethereum network so you must purchase
     your Lands with Ether.
 14. When does the third wave start?
     The third wave will start on Nov 8th. The exact time will be announced
     before the wave begins.
 15. How many Lands will be available in the third wave?
     3000 Lands on Ethereum will be available during the third wave.
 16. What will the rules of the third wave be?
     The official rules of the third wave will be announced very soon, before
     the wave starts.
 17. Where can I see the Lands I bought?
     You can see the Lands on the “Map” page of our website.
     If you purchased Ethereum Lands, you can also see them on OpenSea as part
     of the collection.
 18. How can I trade the lands I bought?
     Ethereum Lands can be traded on OpenSea at
     Flow Lands will soon be listed on marketplaces like VIV3 and BloctoBay. We
     will make an official announcement and share the official links when they
     are listed. We expect this to happen during the first or second week of
     November.
 19. Help, my Lands on OpenSea are not showing their size or location!
     You must refresh the metadata using the button in the top right corner of
     the Lands page on OpenSea.
 20. Can you tell me the exact locations of the specific public
     facilities/Partners?
     For the time being, we do not want the announce which facilities/Partners
     are at which locations.
 21. What can I do with the Code Block NFTs I received from Flow Fest?
     The Code Block NFTs will be useful in the Matrix World once it goes live
     (Q2 2022). For example, they may give that particular functionality to your
     robot companion.
 22. Do I need to buy Lands to make use of the Code Block NFT I received at Flow
     Fest?
     No, you do not need to buy Lands to make use of the Code Block NFTs.
 23. When will the winners of the referral contest be announced?
     The winners will be announced sometime during the first few days of
     November.
 24. Will Matrix World have a native token?
     Currently, we do not have any plans for a native token.

If you have any questions except the above-mentioned ones, please feel free to
join us on any of the channels listed below. Thanks

Telegram-EN:
Telegram-CN:
Twitter:
Discord:
blogs.content:
This post answers the frequently asked questions regarding the Matrix Land pre-sale. All the members are requested to go through it for better understanding about the Matrix World and the pre-sale activity.

  1. Can I still buy Flow Lands? / Is the second wave over?
    Sorry, the second wave of the presale is officially over. All of the available Flow Lands have sold out.
  2. I still have vouchers and see a timer, but it says the Lands are sold out. Can I still buy Lands?
    No, you can no longer buy Flow Lands because they are sold out. The second wave was done on a First Come First Served basis, so you had to claim your Land Vouchers before they sold out OR before the time expired, whichever happened first.
  3. I didn’t get to claim my Land Vouchers on the second wave before it ended, can I claim them during the third wave?
    No, the Flow Vouchers and the Ethereum vouchers are separate. To claim Vouchers in the third wave you must apply and get selected.
  4. How can I apply for the third wave?
    You can apply for the third wave on our website at https://matrixworld.org/presale . You must apply for “Ethereum Lands.”
  5. If I applied for the Flow presale do I have to apply again for the third wave?
    Yes, the third wave is on the Ethereum network and your application will be linked to your Ethereum wallet, so a Flow application will not qualify you. If you have already applied for the Ethereum Lands presale, then you do not have to apply again for the third wave, but if you are not sure, it doesn’t hurt to apply again.
  6. If I applied for the first wave do I have to apply again for the third wave?
    If you have already applied for the Ethereum Lands presale, then you do not have to apply again for the third wave, but if you are not sure, it doesn’t hurt to apply again.
  7. I won Lands in the Flow Lands presale, can I still sign up for the third wave?
    Yes, you are still eligible to apply for the third wave even if you won Lands in the second wave.
  8. Is there an application deadline for the third wave?
    There is no hard deadline for the third wave, but the sooner you enter the better! The third wave will start on Nov. 8th.
  9. I applied for the pre-sale, but I haven’t received an email, why?
    You will only receive an email if your application is selected to participate.
  10. How will I know if my application is accepted?
    You will receive an email with detailed information about how to claim your Land Vouchers and how many you are able to claim.
  11. Do I have to claim all of my Land Vouchers
    No, you are not required to claim all of your vouchers.
  12. What will be the price of Lands in the third wave?
    The third wave of lands will cost 0.2 ETH per Land, same as the first wave.
  13. Can I buy Lands with Flow during the third wave?
    No, the third wave will be on the Ethereum network so you must purchase your Lands with Ether.
  14. When does the third wave start?
    The third wave will start on Nov 8th. The exact time will be announced before the wave begins.
  15. How many Lands will be available in the third wave?
    3000 Lands on Ethereum will be available during the third wave.
  16. What will the rules of the third wave be?
    The official rules of the third wave will be announced very soon, before the wave starts.
  17. Where can I see the Lands I bought?
    You can see the Lands on the “Map” page of our website.
    If you purchased Ethereum Lands, you can also see them on OpenSea as part of the https://opensea.io/collection/matrixworld-landvoucher collection.
  18. How can I trade the lands I bought?
    Ethereum Lands can be traded on OpenSea at https://opensea.io/collection/matrixworld-landvoucher
    Flow Lands will soon be listed on marketplaces like VIV3 and BloctoBay. We will make an official announcement and share the official links when they are listed. We expect this to happen during the first or second week of November.
  19. Help, my Lands on OpenSea are not showing their size or location!
    You must refresh the metadata using the button in the top right corner of the Lands page on OpenSea.
  20. Can you tell me the exact locations of the specific public facilities/Partners?
    For the time being, we do not want the announce which facilities/Partners are at which locations.
  21. What can I do with the Code Block NFTs I received from Flow Fest?
    The Code Block NFTs will be useful in the Matrix World once it goes live (Q2 2022). For example, they may give that particular functionality to your robot companion.
  22. Do I need to buy Lands to make use of the Code Block NFT I received at Flow Fest?
    No, you do not need to buy Lands to make use of the Code Block NFTs.
  23. When will the winners of the referral contest be announced?
    The winners will be announced sometime during the first few days of November.
  24. Will Matrix World have a native token?
    Currently, we do not have any plans for a native token.

If you have any questions except the above-mentioned ones, please feel free to join us on any of the channels listed below. Thanks

blogs.title: The Second Round Selected Applicants can CLAIM their Voucher(s) starting from Oct 26th 2021, 08:00…
blogs.author: MatrixWorld
blogs.description:
Matrix Lands on ETH and Flow

The first round for the Land pre-sale on Ethereum blockchain ended on Oct 25,
2021, 08:00 AM, 2000 Lands were available to be purchased by the selected
applicants within 72 hours. The information about the purchased Lands can be
found on OpenSea at: .

In second round, there will be 5000 Lands available to purchase on Flow
blockchain. The main drop time on Flow will be 08:00 AM, on OCT 26th PDT. The
selected candidates from the second round have been sent e-mails. In the second
round, for each Land there will be multiple applicants selected to purchase the
same Land(s), and the Land(s) will be available to be purchased on the
first-come-first-serve basis. Therefore, you must claim/purchase your Land
Voucher(s) before the second wave sells out.

Applicants will have 72 hours to purchase given land before it gets relocated to
someone else! The purchasing price of each Land is 60 FLOW. Please prepare
sufficient funds in advance.

Price list of Land Voucher: 1x1 60 FLOW, 2X2 240 FLOW, 3X3 540 FLOW, 6X6
2160 FLOW

The only supported wallet to purchase the Land(s) on the Flow blockchain is the
 wallet.

Now, we’ll discuss how to set up the Blocto wallet and pay for the Land(s) using
the Blocto wallet

There are two simple ways to create an account for the Blocto wallet. The first
is through Matrix World website and the second is by downloading the mobile
application for Blocto wallet and creating an account using the Blocto
application.
To create an account using the Matrix World website, visit , and go to section,
a window (see below) will be appeared. Please choose the Flow network.

After you chose the Flow network, you will need to log in, if you have already
registered for the Blocto wallet. Otherwise, input your e-mail address and click
on Sign in/Register, and you will be assigned an address for Flow blockchain.
You can use that address to trade cryptocurrencies on Flow including FLOW token.

To learn more about how to buy FLOW tokens using the Blocto wallet, please have
a look at this .

> The applicants need to use the same wallet address which they used while
> applying for the Land pre-sale.

> It is suggested to use Chrome or Firefox browser.

If you are using the Blocto wallet on mobile, then you will need to use the same
e-mail address to log in on the Matrix World website.

Once you choose the Flow network, the Blocto wallet will be automatically
connect. You need to make sure that you have enough FLOW in your wallet before
claiming your Land(s). The price for each Land in FLOW is 60 FLOW. To check the
balance in your Blocto wallet using a website, please go to the , and log in
using your Blocto wallet credentials as shown in the figure below.

Flow Port to Check the Balance in Blocto Wallet

The available balance will be shown in the dashboard as shown in the
figure below.

Mobile users can check FLOW balance in their dashboard by adding the Flow token
by clicking the + and choosing the Flow token as shown in the figure below.

Once you have sufficient balance and connect your wallet, all of the vouchers
that you can claim will be shown on the screen. You can only claim less than or
exactly the same number of vouchers that you applied for. Once you have chosen
the Land voucher(s) that you want to claim, click the claim button and pay for
the selected Land(s) using the Blocto wallet.

Once you click the Claim button, the transaction will be successfully completed
if you have enough FLOW for the chosen Land(s).
Once the transaction is completed, you will be shown a confirmation message and
receive a notification in the notifications center as shown in the figure below.

After successfully claiming the Land(s) voucher, you will be able to see your
Land(s) position on the map from the notifications center.

After your purchase, you will be able to view and trade your purchased Land
NFT(s) on or .

If you do not claim your Land(s) within the given time, the voucher(s) will
expire and you will not be able to claim the Land(s) anymore.

If you have any questions regarding the procedure for claiming Land voucher(s)
or if you are facing any other problems, please feel free to join us on any of
the channels listed below.

Telegram-EN:
Telegram-CN:
Twitter:
Discord:
blogs.content:
The Second Round Selected Applicants can CLAIM their Voucher(s) starting from Oct 26th 2021, 08:00 AM PDT

The first round for the Land pre-sale on Ethereum blockchain ended on Oct 25, 2021, 08:00 AM, 2000 Lands were available to be purchased by the selected applicants within 72 hours. The information about the purchased Lands can be found on OpenSea at: https://opensea.io/collection/matrixworld-landvoucher.

In second round, there will be 5000 Lands available to purchase on Flow blockchain. The main drop time on Flow will be 08:00 AM, on OCT 26th PDT. The selected candidates from the second round have been sent e-mails. In the second round, for each Land there will be multiple applicants selected to purchase the same Land(s), and the Land(s) will be available to be purchased on the first-come-first-serve basis. Therefore, you must claim/purchase your Land Voucher(s) before the second wave sells out.

Applicants will have 72 hours to purchase given land before it gets relocated to someone else! The purchasing price of each Land is 60 FLOW. Please prepare sufficient funds in advance.

Price list of Land Voucher: 1x1 60 FLOW, 2X2 240 FLOW, 3X3 540 FLOW, 6X6 2160 FLOW

The only supported wallet to purchase the Land(s) on the Flow blockchain is the Blocto wallet.

Now, we’ll discuss how to set up the Blocto wallet and pay for the Land(s) using the Blocto wallet

There are two simple ways to create an account for the Blocto wallet. The first is through Matrix World website and the second is by downloading the mobile application for Blocto wallet and creating an account using the Blocto application.
To create an account using the Matrix World website, visit Matrix World, and go to CLAIM section, a window (see below) will be appeared. Please choose the Flow network.

After you chose the Flow network, you will need to log in, if you have already registered for the Blocto wallet. Otherwise, input your e-mail address and click on Sign in/Register, and you will be assigned an address for Flow blockchain. You can use that address to trade cryptocurrencies on Flow including FLOW token.

To learn more about how to buy FLOW tokens using the Blocto wallet, please have a look at this post.

The applicants need to use the same wallet address which they used while applying for the Land pre-sale.
It is suggested to use Chrome or Firefox browser.

If you are using the Blocto wallet on mobile, then you will need to use the same e-mail address to log in on the Matrix World website.

Once you choose the Flow network, the Blocto wallet will be automatically connect. You need to make sure that you have enough FLOW in your wallet before claiming your Land(s). The price for each Land in FLOW is 60 FLOW. To check the balance in your Blocto wallet using a website, please go to the port.onflow.org, and log in using your Blocto wallet credentials as shown in the figure below.

The available balance will be shown in the dashboard as shown in the figure below.

Mobile users can check FLOW balance in their dashboard by adding the Flow token by clicking the + and choosing the Flow token as shown in the figure below.

Once you have sufficient balance and connect your wallet, all of the vouchers that you can claim will be shown on the screen. You can only claim less than or exactly the same number of vouchers that you applied for. Once you have chosen the Land voucher(s) that you want to claim, click the claim button and pay for the selected Land(s) using the Blocto wallet.

Once you click the Claim button, the transaction will be successfully completed if you have enough FLOW for the chosen Land(s).
Once the transaction is completed, you will be shown a confirmation message and receive a notification in the notifications center as shown in the figure below.

After successfully claiming the Land(s) voucher, you will be able to see your Land(s) position on the map from the notifications center.

After your purchase, you will be able to view and trade your purchased Land NFT(s) on VIV3 or BloctoBay.

If you do not claim your Land(s) within the given time, the voucher(s) will expire and you will not be able to claim the Land(s) anymore.

If you have any questions regarding the procedure for claiming Land voucher(s) or if you are facing any other problems, please feel free to join us on any of the channels listed below.

blogs.title: How to get Flow in Blocto wallet to pay for LAND(s) in Matrix World
blogs.author: MatrixWorld
blogs.description:
Matrix World is offering 5000 Lands on FLOW blockchain and the accepted payment
is FLOW through , which is a Flow supported wallet.

This post will discuss all the possible ways to get FLOW in your Blocto wallet.

FLOW is a native token of Flow blockchain and it’s listed on the following
Exchanges.

THE FLOW SUPPORTED EXCHANGES:

 1. 
    Available Pairs: FLOW/USD, FLOW/EUR, FLOW/BTC, FLOW/ETH, FLOW/GBP
 2. 
    Available Pairs: FLOW/USDT
 3. 
    Available Pairs: FLOW/USDT
 4. 
 5. 
    Available Pairs: FLOW/USDT, FLOW/BTC
 6. (not available for now)
    Available Pairs: FLOW/USDT, FLOW/BUSD, FLOW/BTC

METHOD 1: BUY FLOW TOKENS FROM ANY OF THE ABOVE-MENTIONED EXCHANGES AND THEN
TRANSFER TO THE BLOCTO WALLET USING BLOCTO WALLET ADDRESS THAT YOU USED TO APPLY
FOR PRESALE

If you’re a user of any of the above-mentioned exchanges, you can swap your
tokens with FLOW tokens and then receive them on the Flow blockchain using . The
applicants already have a wallet address that they used to apply for the
presale. They need to use the same wallet address to receive the Flow tokens
from any of the above-mentioned exchanges in the Blocto wallet. The address can
be found by logging into the Matrix World website as shown in the figure below.

The next step is to go to any of the above-mentioned exchanges and withdraw the
Flow token to the address that you used for the presale application.

For better understanding, we’ll elaborate how to receive FLOW tokens from the
Karaken exchange to the Blocto wallet

If you have any tokens in your Binance, Kraken, Gate.io, Huobi Global Exchange,
you need to swap them into USDT, for Kraken users, you need to complete the
Intermediate verify so that you can deposit cash into your Kraken account. You
can swap Flow with USD dollar, Euro, Ethereum or BTC etc. The next step is to
withdraw your Flow from Kraken to Blocto wallet. So, you’ll have the FLOW in
your wallet now. On other Exchanges, if you don’t have any cryptocurrency in
your wallet, you can simply buy from peer to peer using your local currency,
such as USD to USDT.

METHOD 2: BUY FLOW TOKENS DIRECTLY FROM BLOCTO WALLET USING A THIRD-PARTY
(MOONPAY) PAYMENT SERVICE

The Blocto wallet lets users directly buy cryptocurrencies using a third-party
payment service called MoonPay. For that, you need need to log in to the Blocto
mobile application using the same email and wallet address that you used to
apply for the presale. And then click on the buy icon, select the desired
cryptocurrency, and the payment currency such as US Dollar ($), New Taiwan
Dollar (NT$), Japanese Yen (¥), etc. Once you have filled in this information,
you’ll be prompted to fill in some basic information such as name, address,
country, and you’ll have to verify your identity using the required documents
such as a driving license or national id card. The last step is to fill in the
card information to make payment. The amount in your chosen currency unit will
be deducted from your ATM card and the cryptocurrency i.e., FLOW tokens would be
received in your Blocto wallet. And after that, you can use FLOW tokens to pay
for the LAND(S).

3. The description on how to buy FLOW using Blocto Wallet

METHOD 3: USE BLOCTOSWAP, A DECENTRALIZED EXCHANGE

If you have USDT on Ethereum, BSC, or Solana, you can convert them to tUSDT
using BloctoSwap and receive on Flow blockchain in Blocto wallet. For that you
need to follow the below-mentioned steps.

Step 1: Connect your Blocto wallet to BloctoSwap
Use the same e-mail address that you used to apply for the Land presale to log
in the Blocto wallet. Once you are logged in, click confirm.

Step 2: Connect other blockchain wallet such as Ethereum, BSC, Solana
After connecting the Blocto wallet, choose Teleport to transfer your USDT from
Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, or Solana to tUSDT on Flow blockchain.

Step 3: Select Teleport bridge to transfer assets from one blockchain to another
such as from Ethereum to Flow
Below-mentioned are the Ethereum supported wallets, you can use these wallets to
connect with the BloctoSwap and then transfer your USDT from Ethereum blockchain
to tUSDT on Flow blockchain.

The Teleport is actually a bridge that lets users transfer their assets from one
blockchain to another. Such as USDT from Ethereum to tUSDT on Flow blockchain,
USDT from Solana to tUSDT on Flow blockchain, and USDT from Binance Smart Chain
to tUSDT on Flow blockchain.

Step 3: Swap tUSDT to FLOW using Swap
Once the tUSDT is received in the blocto wallet, the users need to use the swap
function on BloctoSwap to convert tUSDT in Flow as shown in the figure below.
And finally they can use FLOW through Blocto wallet and pay for the Land(s).

Thanks for your interest in Matrix World. If you have any questions, please join
us at any of the below-mentioned channels:

Telegram-EN:
Telegram-CN:
Twitter:
Discord:
blogs.content:
Matrix World is offering 5000 Lands on FLOW blockchain and the accepted payment is FLOW through Blocto wallet, which is a Flow supported wallet.

This post will discuss all the possible ways to get FLOW in your Blocto wallet.

FLOW is a native token of Flow blockchain and it’s listed on the following Exchanges.

The FLOW Supported Exchanges:

  1. Kraken
    Available Pairs: FLOW/USD, FLOW/EUR, FLOW/BTC, FLOW/ETH, FLOW/GBP
  2. Gate.io
    Available Pairs: FLOW/USDT
  3. Huobi Global
    Available Pairs: FLOW/USDT
  4. OKEx
  5. KUCOIN
    Available Pairs: FLOW/USDT, FLOW/BTC
  6. Binance (not available for now)
    Available Pairs: FLOW/USDT, FLOW/BUSD, FLOW/BTC

Method 1: Buy FLOW tokens from any of the above-mentioned Exchanges and then transfer to the Blocto wallet using Blocto wallet address that you used to apply for presale

If you’re a user of any of the above-mentioned exchanges, you can swap your tokens with FLOW tokens and then receive them on the Flow blockchain using blocto wallet. The applicants already have a wallet address that they used to apply for the presale. They need to use the same wallet address to receive the Flow tokens from any of the above-mentioned exchanges in the Blocto wallet. The address can be found by logging into the Matrix World website as shown in the figure below.

The next step is to go to any of the above-mentioned exchanges and withdraw the Flow token to the address that you used for the presale application.

For better understanding, we’ll elaborate how to receive FLOW tokens from the Karaken exchange to the Blocto wallet

If you have any tokens in your Binance, Kraken, Gate.io, Huobi Global Exchange, you need to swap them into USDT, for Kraken users, you need to complete the Intermediate verify so that you can deposit cash into your Kraken account. You can swap Flow with USD dollar, Euro, Ethereum or BTC etc. The next step is to withdraw your Flow from Kraken to Blocto wallet. So, you’ll have the FLOW in your wallet now. On other Exchanges, if you don’t have any cryptocurrency in your wallet, you can simply buy from peer to peer using your local currency, such as USD to USDT.

Method 2: Buy FLOW tokens directly from Blocto wallet using a third-party (MoonPay) payment service

The Blocto wallet lets users directly buy cryptocurrencies using a third-party payment service called MoonPay. For that, you need need to log in to the Blocto mobile application using the same email and wallet address that you used to apply for the presale. And then click on the buy icon, select the desired cryptocurrency, and the payment currency such as US Dollar ($), New Taiwan Dollar (NT$), Japanese Yen (¥), etc. Once you have filled in this information, you’ll be prompted to fill in some basic information such as name, address, country, and you’ll have to verify your identity using the required documents such as a driving license or national id card. The last step is to fill in the card information to make payment. The amount in your chosen currency unit will be deducted from your ATM card and the cryptocurrency i.e., FLOW tokens would be received in your Blocto wallet. And after that, you can use FLOW tokens to pay for the LAND(S).

Method 3: Use BloctoSwap, a Decentralized Exchange

If you have USDT on Ethereum, BSC, or Solana, you can convert them to tUSDT using BloctoSwap and receive on Flow blockchain in Blocto wallet. For that you need to follow the below-mentioned steps.

Step 1: Connect your Blocto wallet to BloctoSwap
Use the same e-mail address that you used to apply for the Land presale to log in the Blocto wallet. Once you are logged in, click confirm.

Step 2: Connect other blockchain wallet such as Ethereum, BSC, Solana
After connecting the Blocto wallet, choose Teleport to transfer your USDT from Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, or Solana to tUSDT on Flow blockchain.

Step 3: Select Teleport bridge to transfer assets from one blockchain to another such as from Ethereum to Flow
Below-mentioned are the Ethereum supported wallets, you can use these wallets to connect with the BloctoSwap and then transfer your USDT from Ethereum blockchain to tUSDT on Flow blockchain.

The Teleport is actually a bridge that lets users transfer their assets from one blockchain to another. Such as USDT from Ethereum to tUSDT on Flow blockchain, USDT from Solana to tUSDT on Flow blockchain, and USDT from Binance Smart Chain to tUSDT on Flow blockchain.

Step 3: Swap tUSDT to FLOW using Swap
Once the tUSDT is received in the blocto wallet, the users need to use the swap function on BloctoSwap to convert tUSDT in Flow as shown in the figure below. And finally they can use FLOW through Blocto wallet and pay for the Land(s).

Thanks for your interest in Matrix World. If you have any questions, please join us at any of the below-mentioned channels:

Telegram-EN: https://t.me/joinchat/26ov1EJ6Ln82MjI1
Telegram-CN: https://t.me/matrixchinese

Discord: https://discord.gg/bMQh4ztyhP

blogs.title: The Selected Applicants for the First Round of Land Pre-sale can Claim their Land Voucher(s) Now!
blogs.author: MatrixWorld
blogs.description:
The claim feature for the Land Voucher(s) in Matrix World has been enabled on
Oct 22nd at 08:00 AM PDT. The applicants who have been selected for the first
round, would receive an e-mail regarding the release of claim feature, so they
can claim their Land Voucher(s).

This post will discuss how the selected applicants can claim their Land(s).

In the first round, 2000 Lands on Ethereum will be available to purchase, 481
applicants out of 13,000 have been sent confirmation letters, those 481
applicants will be able to claim their Lands within 72 hours starting from Oct
22nd, 08:00 PDT.

> The applicants need to use the same wallet address which they used while
> applying for the Land pre-sale.

> It is suggested to use Chrome or Firefox browser.

The selected applicants need to visit the Matrix World website Homepage at: and
click the CLAIM button.

Network Selection for a wallet connectivity

Once they click the CLAIM button, a pop-up will appear as shown in the figure
above and the applicants would be asked to choose the blockchain network wallet
they want to connect with. The first round is just for Ethereum and the
applicants need to choose the Ethereum network. Once an applicant chooses the
Ethereum network, the wallet would be automatically connected. The applicants
need to make sure that they selected the “Ethereum Mainnet” and they have enough
Ethers in their wallet. The price for each Land is 0.2 ETH.

Voucher(s) that an applicant can claim

Once the applicant connects the wallet, all the vouchers that an applicant can
claim will be shown on the screen. The applicants can only claim less or exactly
the same number of vouchers they applied for. Once the applicant has chosen the
Land voucher(s) that the applicant wants to claim, click the claim button and
later will be asked to pay for the selected Land(s) using the web3.js integrated
wallet.

The total amount of ETH including the gas fee, that an applicant needs to pay
would be shown in the wallet as shown in the figure below.

The total amount of ETH to be paid using MetaMask

Once the applicant clicks the confirm button, the transaction will be done
successfully if the applicant has enough amount of ETH according to the chosen
Land(s). Please note that the gas fee would be different for you, the
above-mentioned gas fee is just for reference.
Once the transaction is successful, the applicants will be shown a confirmation
message as well as they will receive a notification in the notifications center
as shown in the figure below.

After the successful claim of the voucher for Land(s), applicants can see their
Land(s) position in the map from the notifications center.

After the successful purchase, applicants can view and trade their purchased
Land NFT(s) in Opensea and other NFT marketplaces.

If the selected applicants do not claim within the given time, the voucher(s)
will be expired and the applicants would not be able to claim any Land anymore.

Expired Vouchers

If any applicant has any questions regarding the procedure to claim the Land
voucher(s) or facing any other problem, please feel free to join us at any of
the given below channels.

Telegram-EN:
Telegram-CN:
Twitter:
Discord:

blogs.title: Applications start for Matrix Land(s) pre-sale
blogs.author: MatrixWorld
blogs.description:
Applications for Matrix Land(s) pre-sale start from today (10/10/21) at 09:00 AM
PDT. After evaluating all the submission, up to 2000 Lands on Ethereum would be
offered in Round 1 on Oct 15, up to 5000 Lands would be offered on Flow
blockchain in Round 2 on Oct 26, and up to 3000 Lands would be offered on
Ethereum blockchain in Round 3 on Nov 08.

There are two types of applications for Land pre-sale, individual applicants and
organizations. All the details for both types of applicants are given below.
Please note that Matrix Land community pre-sale is an activity for metaverse
builders and lovers. You may get fewer Lands than what you apply for because we
want to get more builders into the Matrix World ecosystem.

Individual Applicants
Individual applicants can apply for up to 10 Matrix Lands in the community
pre-sale.

Organizations
Organization members can apply for up to 108 Matrix Lands in the community
pre-sale.

Prerequisites
On Ethereum, we support and all other wallets integrated with web3.js. On Flow,
we support Blocto, which is a wallet for Flow.

Steps
There are following steps to apply for Land(s) in pre-sale.

 1. Choose Blockchain
 2. Fill in the basic information
 3. Choose your desired land size and quantity, and submit the application.

Choose Blockchain
The first step is to choose the blockchain on which you want to mint your Land,
there are two blockchain options for now which are Ethereum and Flow.

If you choose Blocto, you’ll create your account using your email address, and a
password would be sent to your email address, after verification you would be
eligible to apply for Land in Matrix. After successful registration, a Flow
blockchain address would be assigned to the applicant against email-address.

Once you have created your account using either MetaMask or Blocto, the second
step is to fill in the basic information such as shown in the figure below.

Fill in the basic information
once applicant have selected the blockchain, the next step is to fill in the
basic information such as age, nationality, etc., as shown in the figure below

Choose your desired land size and quantity, and submit the application
Once you have filled all the information, the next and last step is to choose
the Land(s) and size you want to apply for, as shown in the figure below.

There are different sizes of Land(s) available for pre-sale which are 1*1, 2*2,
3*3, and 6*6. And you have choice to select multiple Land(s) of different sizes
also. After you have selected Land(s) of your requirements, simply click the
‘Submit’ button, and your application would be submitted and you would be
notified about the results through email as well as from our website.

Important Information
In 1st round 2000 Lands would be offered on Ethereum, each Land would cost only
0.2 ETH to mint and for Flow users, the price is the same, but the payment is
via FUSD or FLOW at the community pre-sale stage.
The selected applicants from the 1st round would receive an email on 15th Oct,
and they will have 72 hours to mint offered Land(s) after receiving the email.
The selected candidates from 2nd round would be notified on 26th Oct
The selected candidates from the 3rd round would be notified on 8th Nov.
Candidates, who are not selected for the 1st round, don’t need to worry, will
still have a chance. There’re chances for the applicants who are not selected in
1st round to be selected in 2nd or 3rd round.

Selected applicants would obtain Land Voucher(s) which is basically a land certificates. This voucher is used to prove the land information, location and size you obtained during the pre-sale stage. Most Land Token is a proof of the prototype of the land in Matrix World. 
For more information, you can also refer to our FAQ 
1. https://matrixworld.org/faq and production 
2. https://matrixworld.org/home.

Contact Us
If you face any problems or have any questions, please find us on the below
given links, our team will respond your quires ASAP

-Website:
-Telegram:
-Twitter:
-Discord:

Thanks for your interest in Matrix, we’ll keep continue introducing new and
amazing features, and we’ll keep you updated.
blogs.content:
https://medium.com/media/d1e88b05a360fde7f354a2d156c398ad/href

Applications for Matrix Land(s) pre-sale start from today (10/10/21) at 09:00 AM PDT. After evaluating all the submission, up to 2000 Lands on Ethereum would be offered in Round 1 on Oct 15, up to 5000 Lands would be offered on Flow blockchain in Round 2 on Oct 26, and up to 3000 Lands would be offered on Ethereum blockchain in Round 3 on Nov 08.

There are two types of applications for Land pre-sale, individual applicants and organizations. All the details for both types of applicants are given below. Please note that Matrix Land community pre-sale is an activity for metaverse builders and lovers. You may get fewer Lands than what you apply for because we want to get more builders into the Matrix World ecosystem.

Individual Applicants
Individual applicants can apply for up to 10 Matrix Lands in the community pre-sale.

Organizations
Organization members can apply for up to 108 Matrix Lands in the community pre-sale.

Prerequisites
On Ethereum, we support Metamask and all other wallets integrated with web3.js. On Flow, we support Blocto, which is a wallet for Flow.

Steps
There are following steps to apply for Land(s) in pre-sale.

  1. Choose Blockchain
  2. Fill in the basic information
  3. Choose your desired land size and quantity, and submit the application.

Choose Blockchain
The first step is to choose the blockchain on which you want to mint your Land, there are two blockchain options for now which are Ethereum and Flow.

If you choose Blocto, you’ll create your account using your email address, and a password would be sent to your email address, after verification you would be eligible to apply for Land in Matrix. After successful registration, a Flow blockchain address would be assigned to the applicant against email-address.

Once you have created your account using either MetaMask or Blocto, the second step is to fill in the basic information such as shown in the figure below.

Fill in the basic information
once applicant have selected the blockchain, the next step is to fill in the basic information such as age, nationality, etc., as shown in the figure below

Choose your desired land size and quantity, and submit the application
Once you have filled all the information, the next and last step is to choose the Land(s) and size you want to apply for, as shown in the figure below.

There are different sizes of Land(s) available for pre-sale which are 1*1, 2*2, 3*3, and 6*6. And you have choice to select multiple Land(s) of different sizes also. After you have selected Land(s) of your requirements, simply click the ‘Submit’ button, and your application would be submitted and you would be notified about the results through email as well as from our website.

Important Information
In 1st round 2000 Lands would be offered on Ethereum, each Land would cost only 0.2 ETH to mint and for Flow users, the price is the same, but the payment is via FUSD or FLOW at the community pre-sale stage.
The selected applicants from the 1st round would receive an email on 15th Oct, and they will have 72 hours to mint offered Land(s) after receiving the email.
The selected candidates from 2nd round would be notified on 26th Oct
The selected candidates from the 3rd round would be notified on 8th Nov.
Candidates, who are not selected for the 1st round, don’t need to worry, will still have a chance. There’re chances for the applicants who are not selected in 1st round to be selected in 2nd or 3rd round.

Selected applicants would obtain Land Voucher(s) which is basically a land certificates. This voucher is used to prove the land information, location and size you obtained during the pre-sale stage. Most Land Token is a proof of the prototype of the land in Matrix World. 
For more information, you can also refer to our FAQ 
1. https://matrixworld.org/faq and production 
2. https://matrixworld.org/home.

Contact Us
If you face any problems or have any questions, please find us on the below given links, our team will respond your quires ASAP

-Website: https://matrixworld.org/
-Telegram: https://t.me/joinchat/26ov1EJ6Ln82MjI1
-Twitter: https://twitter.com/theMatrixWorld
-Discord: https://discord.gg/bMQh4ztyhP

Thanks for your interest in Matrix, we’ll keep continue introducing new and amazing features, and we’ll keep you updated.

blogs.title: Register for “Matrix” win Land and several other NFTs!
blogs.author: MatrixWorld
blogs.description:
We are happy to launch our first referral contest where you can win lands in
Matrix metaverse as well as several other NFTs. In order to make the Matrix
world a better place, we are intended to synthesize the world with
multi-elements. Therefore we will offer special NFT airdrops for each player in
the Matrix world. We will offer free NFT airdrops to the owner of several NFT
collections who participated in the early access. Here is what you need to do.

 1. Sign up:
 2. Spread the Referral link to others through FB, Twitter, and other social
    media channels

Timeline
Oct. 03, 2021 - Oct.18, 2021

Visit and click on “Early Access”, this activity is for early access to Matrix
to the top 200 participants.

Once you click on the “Connect” button, there would be two options for you to
connect with.

1. Connect with MetaMask or other web3 wallet
The first option is to connect with the Ethereum wallet, for that, you can use
any Ethereum supported wallet such as MetaMask, C98, and all other wallets
integrated with web3.js. If you don’t have MetaMask already installed, please
click here to install the MetaMask. And once you have created a wallet and
connected to the Matrix, the next option is to log in using your email address,
you’ll receive a . Once you are logged in successfully, you’ll get a referral
link and you can spread that link to friends, the more you spread the link and
other users use your link, the more are the chances for you to win the contest.

2. Connect with Blocto
The second option to log in is to use the ‘blocto’ for that simply click on Flow
logo and you’ll be prompted to a new window, write down your email there and
you’ll receive a verification code on the given email address, use that
verification code to verify.

Once your registration is verified, you would be given a referral link. Use that
referral link to get more registration and higher ranking, and higher chances to
win the land in the Matrix World.

Users can copy the link or they can directly post to their Facebook or/and
Twitter account by just clicking the button. So, this was the whole process on
how to register and get a referral link. Top 200 ranks would be rewarded Lands
in the Matrix World. Here is some information about what will you get.

Every valid referred registration will be evaluated and ranked. The top 200
players with the most referred registrations will be rewarded as one
pre-released Land plot in the Matrix World. We will open the pre-sale
application and start the qualification review process simultaneously in
mid-October. Further information about the Matrix world will be released and
updated on the website after October 8th PDT.

Players can find the ranking status with the number of referred registrations on
their status pane. The result will be announced soon after the pre-sale starts,
and the rewards will be airdropped as the pre-sale is finished.

Official Website:
Discord:
Telegram:
Facebook:
Twitter:
blogs.content:
We are happy to launch our first referral contest where you can win lands in Matrix metaverse as well as several other NFTs. In order to make the Matrix world a better place, we are intended to synthesize the world with multi-elements. Therefore we will offer special NFT airdrops for each player in the Matrix world. We will offer free NFT airdrops to the owner of several NFT collections who participated in the early access. Here is what you need to do.

  1. Sign up: https://matrixworld.org/activity
  2. Spread the Referral link to others through FB, Twitter, and other social media channels

Timeline
Oct. 03, 2021 - Oct.18, 2021

How to Sign up?

Visit here and click on “Early Access”, this activity is for early access to Matrix to the top 200 participants.

Once you click on the “Connect” button, there would be two options for you to connect with.

1. Connect with MetaMask or other web3 wallet
The first option is to connect with the Ethereum wallet, for that, you can use any Ethereum supported wallet such as MetaMask, C98, and all other wallets integrated with web3.js. If you don’t have MetaMask already installed, please click here to install the MetaMask. And once you have created a wallet and connected to the Matrix, the next option is to log in using your email address, you’ll receive a . Once you are logged in successfully, you’ll get a referral link and you can spread that link to friends, the more you spread the link and other users use your link, the more are the chances for you to win the contest.

2. Connect with Blocto
The second option to log in is to use the ‘blocto’ for that simply click on Flow logo and you’ll be prompted to a new window, write down your email there and you’ll receive a verification code on the given email address, use that verification code to verify.

Once your registration is verified, you would be given a referral link. Use that referral link to get more registration and higher ranking, and higher chances to win the land in the Matrix World.

Users can copy the link or they can directly post to their Facebook or/and Twitter account by just clicking the button. So, this was the whole process on how to register and get a referral link. Top 200 ranks would be rewarded Lands in the Matrix World. Here is some information about what will you get.

Who will win?

Every valid referred registration will be evaluated and ranked. The top 200 players with the most referred registrations will be rewarded as one pre-released Land plot in the Matrix World. We will open the pre-sale application and start the qualification review process simultaneously in mid-October. Further information about the Matrix world will be released and updated on the website after October 8th PDT.

When the airdrops would be offered?

Players can find the ranking status with the number of referred registrations on their status pane. The result will be announced soon after the pre-sale starts, and the rewards will be airdropped as the pre-sale is finished.

Official Website: https://matrixworld.org/home
Discord: https://discord.gg/bMQh4ztyhP
Telegram: https://t.me/joinchat/26ov1EJ6Ln82MjI1
